{"id":513098551,"lang":"java","time":"4 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1624642622,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/513098551/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Recover Binary Search Tree","memory":"39.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    TreeNode prev = null, first = null, second = null;\n\n    public void recoverTree(TreeNode root) {\n        evalSwappedNodes(root);\n        int temp = first.val;\n        first.val = second.val;\n        second.val = temp;\n    }\n\n    private void evalSwappedNodes(TreeNode curr) {\n        if (curr == null)\n            return;\n        evalSwappedNodes(curr.left);\n        if (prev != null && prev.val > curr.val) {\n            if (first == null)\n                first = prev;\n            second = curr;\n        }\n        prev = curr;\n        evalSwappedNodes(curr.right);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"recover-binary-search-tree"}
